creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: semicircular disk divided into three sections; the larger center area has 2 dragons, a double fish and a floral motif; the smaller end segments have single bird motif; the disc ends with fish motif hooks with the hook attached to the mouth of the fish; closure is a single metal strip with 3 beehive shaped spiral motifs topped with a metal ball; spirals are coiled wire attached to the closure strip
title: Torque
